intro: As an engineer, I enjoy working at the intersection between design and code. I approach engineering challenges through UX lenses, with simplicity and usability at the forefront. Some of the technologies I use everyday are Ruby on Rails, Coffeescript, and Sass.

items.title: Creative People
items.subtitle: Prototype for creative careers platform
items.description: CreativePPL is a careers platform geared towards web and mobile professionals in Thailand. I worked on this project as an intern at MAQE in Bangkok. Over the span of ten weeks, we conducted market research, developed wireframes and a proof of concept. The web application is built in Ruby on Rails.
